title: Good Morning GD
body:
How are you all this morning?  It's already hot and humid out, but my mom and I are heading down to DC today anyways to celebrate the end of school.  Should be fun.

Just a reminder that this thread would probably be deleted on the new "All Chat" for being spam.  So make sure today you go over to Boards Feedback and give your feedback if you have no already done so.
